name: Comfy Fishing
description:
Submission to Cozy Autumn 2022 Game Jam

Hold left click to cast. Left click to reel . Repeatedly left click to catch the fish when the mark pops up.

The further out your bobber goes the better your chances to attract fish are.

Known Features (Bugs):

- If you reel the fishing rod before the fish gets hooked, the fish will stay there unit you cast again. Then the fish will move to the bobber.

- The fishing line is super thin that it appears non-existent

- If you download the game, Quitting with the escape key freezes the game

Credits:

- Background Music by Legacynical (They don't have a link)

- Used byAssets: KenneyNL https://kenney.nl/assets

- Lowpoly water  https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/particles-effects/lowpoly-water-1075...
